name: docs
description: Documentation for the SDK with examples
author: vechain Foundation

scripts.start-thor-solo:
echo 'Starting thor solo node ...' && docker compose up -d --wait && echo '
Thor solo node started ...'
scripts.stop-thor-solo: echo 'Stopping thor solo node ...' && docker compose down && echo 'Thor solo node stopped ...'
scripts.test:examples:solo: (yarn start-thor-solo && yarn test:examples && yarn stop-thor-solo) || yarn stop-thor-solo
